Education: David Seymour set to make school truancy announcement as new attendance data is released https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/education-david-seymour-set-to-make-school-truancy-announcement-as-new-attendance-data-is-released/6BXPJBBQMZGZ7DGPJJ5PTCMAUA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/education-david-seymour-set-to-make-school-truancy-announcement-as-new-attendance-data-is-released/6BXPJBBQMZGZ7DGPJJ5PTCMAUA/ Julia GabelThe announcement will be live-streamed from 10.30am.Wed, 25 Sep 2024 22:08:33 +0000 Associate Education Minister David Seymour is a champion for charter schools. Coroner sets December review for Pauline Hanna’s death after Polkinghorne acquittal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-sets-december-review-for-pauline-hannas-death-after-polkinghorne-acquittal/UY6XYQ6LGBGY3MKHCSFBNTO6II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-sets-december-review-for-pauline-hannas-death-after-polkinghorne-acquittal/UY6XYQ6LGBGY3MKHCSFBNTO6II/ Benjamin PlummerThe review will be held in December 2024 to determine next steps in the coronial inquiry. Wed, 25 Sep 2024 21:43:29 +0000 A review hearing into the death of Pauline Hanna has been set down for December as advised by the Coroner just days after Philip Polkinghorne was acquitted for the murder and manslaughter of his wife. Photo / Michael Craig
